title: Boxer named Balochistan police envoy - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
QUETTA: Balochistan police have appointed Shoaib Khan Zehri, the WBC World Title holder in Asia, as its goodwill ambassador.

In addition to his new role, Mr Zehri was also given an honorary rank of deputy superintendent of police (DSP) by IGP Moazzam Jah Ansari, on Tuesday.

He is the second athlete to be appointed goodwill ambassador of Balochistan, afer fast bowler Nasim Shah.

Published in Dawn, February 19th, 2025
